data.text: @ShepherdWells Well we have the combined brain power of an overripe banana at the moment so you could still be right!! 🤣
@thewildgdn I’ll check it out but your more likely right … I’m a birdwatcher 😳
@thewildgdn It's Early Dog-violet Viola reichenbachiana. No notched spur (also darker than common dog) and shorter sepal appendages.

@ShepherdWells Ooh nice! Pretty sure the yellow flower is lesser celandine (ficaria verna) unless I've got the perspective all wrong! We actually covered it as one of our native plants ☺️ Got loads in our garden just starting to flower!
@MothMighty That one is such a lovely colour, it's almost blue!
@thewildgdn Ben & Ellie hope your feeling better soon he’s my 1st proper wild Primroses of this year & Marsh Marigolds (I think) https://t.co/5xFU7DGriD
@DawnusVito Thank you! And yes that ladybird is very inspiring 🐞🐞🐞🧡
@thewildgdn 50% of our household have it too, and the more substantial one as you say. I did manage to see some violets though yesterday! https://t.co/bnplknX9nG
@thewildgdn Been there! Feels like your body is fighting with itself ☹ get well soon guys. Make like this ladybird and wait it out x https://t.co/1aCmb6p4NL
